DOC.brief_summary: In prospective trial aim investigate intra-individual inter-individual variance secondary hyperalgesia follow pain elicit experimental pain model : Brief Thermal Sensitization . Furthermore wish investigate precise psychological test , Pain Catastrophizing Scale Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale predict size area secondary hyperalgesia .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year < 35 year Speak understand Danish Male gender Test subject understood sign informed consent No prescription medicine last 30 day Test subject cooperate test Test subject alcohol and/or substance abuse , assess investigator Test subject , consume one several type analgesic 2 < day study Test subject , consume antidepressant medication last 30 day study Test subject chronic pain Test subject psychiatric diagnosis Test subject tattoos extremity Body Mass Index > 30 < 18
